languages.text: [Уронить бюст в купальню] "Ой. Ну, невелика потеря".
[Drop the soap sculpture into the bathtub] "How clumsy of me. Well, it is only soap."
languages.original_text: [Уронить бюст в купальню] "Ой. Ну, невелика потеря".

traits.locale_text: [Drop the bust into the bathtub] "Oh. Well, it is no great loss."

languages.text: [Lâcher la sculpture de savon dans la baignoire] « Comme je suis {mf|maladroit|maladroite} ! Enfin, ce n'est qu'un morceau de savon. »
languages.original_text: [Drop the soap sculpture into the bathtub] "How clumsy of me. Well, it is only soap."

traits.locale_text: [Lâcher la sculpture de savon dans la baignoire] « Comme je suis {mf|maladroit|maladroite} ! Enfin, ce n'est qu'un morceau de savon. »

languages.text: [Soltar la escultura de jabón en la bañera] «Qué torpe. Bueno, solo es jabón».
languages.original_text: [Drop the soap sculpture into the bathtub] "How clumsy of me. Well, it is only soap."

traits.locale_text: [Soltar la escultura de jabón en la bañera] «Qué torpe. Bueno, solo es jabón».

languages.text: [将香皂雕成的雕像扔进浴缸]“哎哟，我这手可真笨。不过不要紧，不过是块香皂而已。”
languages.original_text: [Drop the soap sculpture into the bathtub] "How clumsy of me. Well, it is only soap."

traits.locale_text: [将香皂雕成的雕像扔进浴缸]“哎哟，我这手可真笨。不过不要紧，不过是块香皂而已。”

languages.text: [石鹸でできた彫刻をバスタブに落とす]「ドジをしてしまった。まぁ、たかが石鹸だからな」
languages.original_text: [Drop the soap sculpture into the bathtub] "How clumsy of me. Well, it is only soap."

traits.locale_text: [石鹸でできた彫刻をバスタブに落とす]「ドジをしてしまった。まぁ、たかが石鹸だからな」

languages.text: [Die Seifenskulptur in die Badewanne plumpsen lassen] "Wie ungeschickt von mir. Na ja, ist ja nur Seife."
languages.original_text: [Drop the soap sculpture into the bathtub] "How clumsy of me. Well, it is only soap."
